Articles.Content:
This one get high speed but it's not a stun vehicle. So don't try to kill anyone inside.

Before riding. please press "g" to lock steering on rear wheel. keep it steering is ok but at hight speed it will become over turn. so just recommend ^^.

APC-MKI. Link download APC-MKI .Craft file: http://www./?u4w2713pcvwc510

Javascript is disabled. View full album

APC-MKII Link download APC-MKII .craft file: http://www./?rg65wnnbwxct9mo

Javascript is disabled. View full album

APC-MKIII (Shock trooper landing style - Beware over 250 part, i try my best as i can sorry). Link download APC-MKIII .Craft file: http://www./?c29df4p0xcblcku

Use "space bar" to next stage for transform. (My advice, keep both side engine working, stop the central before "next stage", just my advice ^^)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

APC-MKIV (Vtol-Flying style). Link donwload .Craft file: http://www./?yfp23hi18rphmk1

Press "1" for Vtol engine, press again to disable. press "2" for jet engine, press again to disable

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Enjoy riding!

Edited September 14, 2013 by hellknguyen
Dude that thing almost looks like the Batmobile!

That's awesome! It's like how I would design my APCs!

I love the IVA like-designs of your crew bay and the exterior of your APC looks a lot better than my current APC. I'll be downloading yours to incorporate into my fleet

That's awesome! It's like how I would design my APCs!

I love the IVA like-designs of your crew bay and the exterior of your APC looks a lot better than my current APC. I'll be downloading yours to incorporate into my fleet

Thanks mate. Your design is one of the best land vehicle here. I like your style, simple but effect than me. Mine is always over 100 part.
Update new model with MKII. 114 part total, less than MKI.
I already upload link download file in first post. Please recheck it.
Looks really cool. Any number on the amount of Kerbals? Too lazy to count

Update new model. APC-MKIII (Shock trooper landing style - Beware over 250 part, i try my best as i can sorry)

Looks really cool. Any number on the amount of Kerbals? Too lazy to count

Ha ha, i'm same level lazy like you mate, why don't you give a try and let all of us know about the number.

Update new model. APC-MKIV taxi (Vtol-flying style).

Enjoy riding.
Great job, my favorite one is the MK2
